member.name: T:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask
member.summary: Task to serialize resource files with localized labels to JS files.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.CreateJSFiles(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Cria os arquivos JS utilizando a cultura e os resources especificados.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.NormalizePropertyName(System.String)
member.summary: Normaliza o nome de uma propriedade.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.ForEachCulture(System.Action{System.Globalization.CultureInfo})
member.summary: Executa a action para cada cultura informada pelo usuário da linha de comando.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.ForEachResource(System.Action{System.Type,System.Resources.ResourceManager})
member.summary: Executa a action para cada resource informado pelo usuário da linha de comando.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.GetSerializableProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Obtém as propriedades do resource que serão serializadas.
member.returns: As propriedades que podem ser serializadas.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.LoadResourceXmlFile(System.String,System.Type,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Carrega o arquivo xml do resource informado.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.AssemblyFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the filename of the assembly with the resources files.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.SerializationFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the serialization folder where the generated JS files will be writen.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.CultureCodes
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of culture codes to be considered.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.DefaultCultureCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default culture code.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.IgnoreResourceNames
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of resource files that should be ignored.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.Resources2JSTask.TextNotFoundMarkup
member.summary: Gets or sets the text not found markup.

member.name: T:EasyBuild.StartWebProjectTask
member.summary: Task to start a solution web project using WebDev server.

member.name: M:EasyBuild.StartWebProjectTask.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.StartWebProjectTask.ProjectFolderName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of web project folder.

member.name: P:EasyBuild.StartWebProjectTask.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port used to host the web project on WebDev server.
